category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_enable_on_the_fly_projectobjectrelation_migration
preference.preference_description: Specifies if the ProjectObjectRelation object from legacy data i.e. data from previous releases should be migrated on the fly or not. The default value is set to false and system will handle the co-existance of new ProjectObjectRelation and un-migrated ProjectObjectRelation objects and will not have any functional impact on the system. Valid values are: * true: migration of ProjectObjectRelation is enabled this will trigger migration of ProjectObjectRelation whenever it is encountered. * false: no migration of ProjectObjectRelation will be performed when legacy ProjectObjectRelation is encountered.
